verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Even to day מְרִ֣י <S%H4805><s%> bitter שִׂחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> [is] my complaint יָ֝דִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> my stroke כָּבְדָ֥ה <S%H3513><s%> is heavier עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> despite אַנְחָתִֽי׃ <S%H585><s%> than my groaning

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Oh that יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I knew וְאֶמְצָאֵ֑הוּ <S%H4672><s%> where I might find אָ֝ב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> him [that] I might come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against תְּכוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8499><s%> [even] to his seat

אֶעֶרְכָ֣ה <S%H6186><s%> I would order לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> [my] cause וּ֝פִ֗י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth אֲמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> him and fill תוֹכָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8433><s%> with arguments

אֵ֭דְעָה <S%H3045><s%> I would know מִלִּ֣ים <S%H4405><s%> the words יַעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> [which] he would answer וְ֝אָבִ֗ינָה <S%H995><s%> me and understand מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֹּ֥אמַר <S%H559><s%> what he would say לִֽי׃

הַבְּרָב־ <S%H7227><s%> in abundance כֹּ֭חַ <S%H3581><s%> ability יָרִ֣יב <S%H7378><s%> Will he plead עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> surely ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָשִׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> pay בִּֽי׃

שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> There יָ֭שָׁר <S%H3477><s%> There the righteous נוֹכָ֣ח <S%H3198><s%> might dispute עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and I וַאֲפַלְּטָ֥ה <S%H6403><s%> with him so should I be delivered לָ֝נֶ֗צַח <S%H5331><s%> for ever מִשֹּׁפְטִֽי׃ <S%H8199><s%> from my judge

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold קֶ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> forward אֶהֱלֹ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Behold I go וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else וְ֝אָח֗וֹר <S%H268><s%> but he [is] not [there] and backward וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot אָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> but I cannot perceive לֽוֹ׃

שְׂמֹ֣אול <S%H8040><s%> On the left hand בַּעֲשֹׂת֣וֹ <S%H6213><s%> where he doth work וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot אָ֑חַז <S%H2372><s%> but I cannot behold יַעְטֹ֥ף <S%H5848><s%> [him] he hideth יָ֝מִ֗ין <S%H3225><s%> himself on the right hand וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> that I cannot see

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָ֭דַע <S%H3045><s%> But he knoweth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> that I take בְּ֝חָנַ֗נִי <S%H974><s%> [when] he hath tried כַּזָּהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> as gold אֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> me I shall come forth

בַּ֭אֲשֻׁרוֹ <S%H838><s%> his steps אָחֲזָ֣ה <S%H270><s%> hath held רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7272><s%> My foot דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way שָׁמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> have I kept וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אָֽט׃ <S%H5186><s%> and not declined

מִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> from the commandment שְׂ֭פָתָיו <S%H8193><s%> of his lips וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not אָמִ֑ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> Neither have I gone back מֵ֝חֻקִּ֗י <S%H2706><s%> more than my necessary צָפַ֥נְתִּי <S%H6845><s%> I have esteemed אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> the words פִֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth

וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He בְ֭אֶחָד <S%H259><s%> But he [is] in one וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and who יְשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> [mind] and who can turn וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> him? and [what] his soul אִוְּתָ֣ה <S%H183><s%> desireth וַיָּֽעַשׂ׃ <S%H6213><s%> even [that] he doeth

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> for יַשְׁלִ֣ים <S%H7999><s%> For he performeth חֻקִּ֑י <S%H2706><s%> [the thing that is] appointed וְכָהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> such רַבּ֣וֹת <S%H7227><s%> for me and many עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> at מִפָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> at his presence אֶבָּהֵ֑ל <S%H926><s%> Therefore am I troubled אֶ֝תְבּוֹנֵ֗ן <S%H995><s%> when I consider וְאֶפְחַ֥ד <S%H6342><s%> I am afraid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at
וְ֭אֵל <S%H410><s%> For God הֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H7401><s%> soft לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> maketh my heart וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> and the Almighty הִבְהִילָֽנִי׃ <S%H926><s%> troubleth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִ֭צְמַתִּי <S%H6789><s%> Because I was not cut off מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> the darkness וּ֝מִפָּנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> from my face כִּסָּה־ <S%H3680><s%> [neither] hath he covered אֹֽפֶל׃ <S%H652><s%> the darkness
